message_1:
Using Rail fence cipher technique, encrypt the following message:

"GO TO THE PARK"

with a key of 3 rails.
message_2:
To encrypt the message "GO TO THE PARK" using the Rail Fence cipher with a key of 3 rails, we first remove the spaces and then arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

G . . . O . . . H . . . A
. T . T . E . P . R .
. . O . . . T . . . K

Now, we read the letters from left to right, top to bottom:

G O H A T T E P R O T K

So, the encrypted message is "GOHATTEPROTK".
